response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards. This exceptional item holds immense value to us, reflecting over $12,000 in development and materials costs. Considering its unique features and unparalleled quality, we believe it would be a valuable addition to your collection. We kindly invite you to consider acquiring this product at an exclusive introductory price of $15,000. Should you have any questions or wish to discuss further, please feel free to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of sharing this remarkable product with you.", "product_price": 15000}
